February   Rene Abbott Jylah Bah and Alexis Algazy

February   Jessica Silverman

By Angel Feliciano News Staff

Knock knock PERIOD Whos there Bea PERIOD Bea who Beaware Halloween is coming PERIOD

Halloween is just around the corner PERIOD This calls for trips to the pumpkin patch dressing up as your favorite character no matter how ridiculous you look and gathering your closest friends for scary movie marathons PERIOD

From horror to bloody and gory films tis the season to be frightened PERIOD We ambushed four students to see what their favorite scary movies are during this Halloween season PERIOD

Night of the Living Dead. theyre classics basically the original Fear Factor. elyssa Wiecek middler pharmacy major









Silence of the Lambs because its got fantastic acting it really gets into your head and its not just bloody and gory. elon Zlotnik freshman international business major







The Ring. it was creepy it shocked me PERIOD I was still scared a few days after watching it. alyanna Tenorio sophomore mechanical engineering major





Spirited Away. the animation and the way the artist portrays all characters in a really frightening way. alexa Azarian freshman art major



The independent student newspaper of Northeastern University
title: Inside Ambush: What is your favorite scary movie? - The Huntington News
name: Northeastern University
